message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $92, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $88?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $90?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $87?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can do $89, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great product, and I think you'll love it.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $86?
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. Let's meet in the middle one more time. How about we settle on $88.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $85?
